statements: SELECT * FROM PatientInformation WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM PatientInformation WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, address, contact_number FROM PatientInformation WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation WHERE patient_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth, medical_history FROM PatientInformation WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation WHERE date_of_birth >= '2000-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, address FROM PatientInformation WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation WHERE gender = 'Male' AND current_medications LIKE '%Aspirin%';
SELECT patient_name, address FROM PatientInformation WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation WHERE gender = 'Female' AND address LIKE '%Lane';
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM PatientInformation WHERE date_of_birth < '1980-01-01';
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation WHERE contact_number LIKE '%123%' AND current_medications NOT LIKE '%Antibiotics%';
SELECT patient_name, address, medical_history FROM PatientInformation WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation WHERE date_of_birth = '1995-05-20';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, address, contact_number FROM PatientInformation WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' AND medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT patient_name, current_medications FROM PatientInformation WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation WHERE patient_id = 5 OR patient_id = 10;

SELECT * FROM PatientInformation WHERE gender = 'Female' AND address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT patient_name, contact_number FROM PatientInformation WHERE medical_history LIKE '%diabetes%';
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT gender FROM PatientInformation;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM PatientInformation;
SELECT patient_name, address, medical_history FROM PatientInformation WHERE current_medications IS NULL;
SELECT patient_name, contact_number FROM PatientInformation WHERE date_of_birth < '1980-01-01' AND (gender = 'Male' OR gender = 'Other');
SELECT patient_name, address FROM PatientInformation WHERE contact_number IN ('1234567890', '9876543210');
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM PatientInformation WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '2000-12-31';
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM PatientInformation WHERE medical_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, date_of_birth, contact_number FROM PatientInformation WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT patient_name, address, contact_number FROM PatientInformation WHERE medical_history LIKE '%hypertension%' OR current_medications LIKE '%heart%';
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation WHERE address = '123 Main Street' AND medical_history LIKE '%asthma%' AND current_medications IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, medical_history FROM PatientInformation WHERE gender = 'Male' AND (medical_history LIKE '%cancer%' OR medical_history LIKE '%tumor%');
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM PatientInformation WHERE gender = 'Female' AND DATE_FORMAT(date_of_birth, '%Y') = '1995';
SELECT * FROM PatientInformation WHERE address NOT LIKE '%Street';
SELECT patient_name, medical_history FROM PatientInformation WHERE patient_name LIKE '%John%' AND medical_history IS NOT NULL;
SELECT patient_name, address, contact_number FROM PatientInformation WHERE current_medications IS NOT NULL ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, gender FROM PatientInformation WHERE medical_history LIKE '%infection%' OR current_medications LIKE '%antibiotics%';

SELECT * FROM medical_history WHERE date_of_visit BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2015-12-31'

SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM medical_history WHERE date_of_visit BETWEEN '2010-01-01' AND '2015-12-31'
SELECT d.first_name, m.diagnosis FROM demographics d JOIN medical_history m ON d.patient_id = m.patient_id
SELECT d.last_name, m.treatment FROM demographics d JOIN medical_history m ON d.patient_id = m.patient_id

SELECT * FROM demographics;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM demographics;
SELECT patient_id, full_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM demographics;
SELECT * FROM medical_history;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM medical_history;
SELECT patient_id, last_visit_date FROM medical_history;
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medication_name, dosage FROM medications;
SELECT patient_id, frequency FROM medications;

SELECT demographics.full_name, medical_history.diagnosis, medications.medication_name FROM demographics, medical_history, medications WHERE demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id AND demographics.patient_id = medications.patient_id;

SELECT demographics.full_name, medical_history.last_visit_date, medications.dosage FROM demographics JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id JOIN medications ON demographics.patient_id = medications.patient_id;

SELECT demographics.full_name, medical_history.diagnosis, medications.medication_name FROM demographics INNER JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id INNER JOIN medications ON demographics.patient_id = medications.patient_id;

SELECT demographics.full_name, medical_history.diagnosis, medications.medication_name FROM demographics LEFT JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id LEFT JOIN medications ON demographics.patient_id = medications.patient_id;

SELECT demographics.full_name, medical_history.diagnosis, medications.medication_name FROM demographics RIGHT JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id RIGHT JOIN medications ON demographics.patient_id = medications.patient_id;

SELECT demographics.full_name, medical_history.diagnosis, medications.medication_name FROM demographics JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id AND medical_history.last_visit_date >= '2022-01-01' JOIN medications ON demographics.patient_id = medications.patient_id;

SELECT demographics.full_name, medical_history.diagnosis, medications.medication_name FROM demographics JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id AND medical_history.last_visit_date < '2022-01-01' JOIN medications ON demographics.patient_id = medications.patient_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM demographics;
SELECT AVG(date_of_birth) FROM demographics;
SELECT MIN(last_visit_date) FROM medical_history;
SELECT MAX(dosage) FROM medications;
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM demographics;
SELECT full_name, gender FROM demographics WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT full_name, diagnosis, last_visit_date FROM demographics JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id;
SELECT full_name, medication_name, dosage, frequency FROM demographics JOIN medications ON demographics.patient_id = medications.patient_id;
SELECT full_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM demographics JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE treatment IS NOT NULL;
SELECT full_name, medication_name, dosage FROM demographics JOIN medications ON demographics.patient_id = medications.patient_id WHERE dosage > '100mg';
SELECT full_name, medication_name, frequency FROM demographics JOIN medications ON demographics.patient_id = medications.patient_id WHERE frequency = 'daily';

SELECT full_name, gender, treatment, last_visit_date FROM demographics JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE gender = 'F' AND last_visit_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM demographics;
SELECT gender, COUNT(*) FROM demographics GROUP BY gender;
SELECT full_name, COUNT(*) AS num_medication FROM demographics JOIN medications ON demographics.patient_id = medications.patient_id GROUP BY full_name HAVING num_medication > 2;
SELECT full_name, AVG(DATEDIFF(NOW(), date_of_birth)) AS avg_age FROM demographics GROUP BY full_name ORDER BY avg_age DESC;
SELECT full_name, medication_name, frequency FROM demographics JOIN medications ON demographics.patient_id = medications.patient_id ORDER BY full_name ASC, frequency DESC;

SELECT full_name, diagnosis, last_visit_date FROM demographics JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id UNION SELECT full_name, diagnosis, last_visit_date FROM demographics RIGHT JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id;

SELECT full_name, medication_name, last_visit_date FROM demographics JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id UNION SELECT full_name, medication_name, last_visit_date FROM demographics RIGHT JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id;
SELECT full_name, medication_name, last_visit_date FROM demographics LEFT JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id;
SELECT full_name, medication_name, last_visit_date FROM demographics RIGHT JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id;
SELECT full_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM demographics LEFT JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id;
SELECT full_name, medication_name, dosage FROM demographics RIGHT JOIN medications ON demographics.patient_id = medications.patient_id;
SELECT full_name, diagnosis, date_of_birth FROM demographics CROSS JOIN medical_history;
SELECT * FROM demographics;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM demographics;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM medical_history;
SELECT diagnosis, treatment FROM medical_history WHERE diagnosis LIKE 'Cancer%';
SELECT * FROM medications;
SELECT medications.medication_name, medications.dosage, demographics.patient_name FROM medications INNER JOIN demographics ON medications.patient_id = demographics.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, allergen FROM demographics INNER JOIN allergies ON demographics.patient_id = allergies.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, frequency FROM medications INNER JOIN demographics ON medications.patient_id = demographics.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE patient_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT * FROM medical_history WHERE date_admitted > '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM medical_history INNER JOIN demographics ON medical_history.patient_id = demographics.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, allergen, reaction FROM allergies INNER JOIN demographics ON allergies.patient_id = demographics.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, treatment FROM medical_history INNER JOIN demographics ON medical_history.patient_id = demographics.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name FROM medications INNER JOIN demographics ON medications.patient_id = demographics.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage FROM medications INNER JOIN demographics ON medications.patient_id = demographics.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, frequency, age FROM medications INNER JOIN demographics ON medications.patient_id = demographics.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM allergies WHERE reaction LIKE '%itching%';
SELECT patient_name, allergen FROM demographics LEFT JOIN allergies ON demographics.patient_id = allergies.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM demographics ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM demographics;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM demographics WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM demographics JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, allergen FROM demographics JOIN allergies ON demographics.patient_id = allergies.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, dosage FROM demographics JOIN medications ON demographics.patient_id = medications.patient_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patients FROM demographics;
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age FROM demographics;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM demographics JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, frequency FROM demographics JOIN medications ON demographics.patient_id = medications.patient_id WHERE frequency = 'daily';

SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, allergen FROM demographics JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id JOIN allergies ON demographics.patient_id = allergies.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, treatment, date_admitted FROM demographics JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name, frequency FROM demographics JOIN medications ON demographics.patient_id = medications.patient_id WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40;
SELECT patient_name, age, allergen FROM demographics JOIN allergies ON demographics.patient_id = allergies.patient_id WHERE reaction = 'severe';
SELECT patient_name, allergen, reaction FROM demographics JOIN allergies ON demographics.patient_id = allergies.patient_id WHERE age > 60;

SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, medication_name FROM demographics JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id JOIN medications ON demographics.patient_id = medications.patient_id;

SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, medication_name FROM demographics JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id JOIN medications ON demographics.patient_id = medications.patient_id WHERE age < 50;

SELECT patient_name, treatment, date_admitted, reaction FROM demographics JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id JOIN allergies ON demographics.patient_id = allergies.patient_id;

SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis, allergen FROM demographics JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id JOIN allergies ON demographics.patient_id = allergies.patient_id WHERE age > 50;

SELECT patient_name, medication_name, frequency, allergen FROM demographics JOIN medications ON demographics.patient_id = medications.patient_id JOIN allergies ON demographics.patient_id = allergies.patient_id;

SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, medication_name, dosage FROM demographics JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id JOIN medications ON demographics.patient_id = medications.patient_id WHERE age > 40;

SELECT patient_id, patient_name FROM demographics
SELECT patient_id, date_of_birth FROM demographics
SELECT * FROM medical_history
SELECT patient_id, diagnosis FROM medical_history
SELECT patient_id, treatment FROM medical_history
SELECT * FROM medications
SELECT patient_id, medication_name FROM medications
SELECT patient_id, dosage FROM medications
SELECT * FROM appointments
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id FROM appointments
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date FROM appointments
SELECT * FROM allergies
SELECT patient_id, allergen FROM allergies
SELECT patient_id, reaction FROM allergies
SELECT demographics.patient_name, medical_history.diagnosis FROM demographics INNER JOIN medical_history ON demographics.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id
SELECT medications.medication_name, appointments.appointment_date FROM medications INNER JOIN appointments ON medications.patient_id = appointments.patient_id
SELECT demographics.patient_name, appointments.appointment_date FROM demographics INNER JOIN appointments ON demographics.patient_id = appointments.patient_id
SELECT patient_name, DATE_PART('year', age(date_of_birth)) AS age FROM demographics
SELECT patient_name, allergen, reaction FROM demographics INNER JOIN allergies ON demographics.patient_id = allergies.patient_id
SELECT * FROM demographics WHERE patient_name LIKE 'John%' AND date_of_birth > '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_name,diagnosis,treatment FROM demographics d JOIN medical_history m ON d.patient_id = m.patient_id;
SELECT patient_name,medication_name,dosage FROM demographics d JOIN medications md ON d.patient_id = md.patient_id;
SELECT appointment_date,notes FROM demographics d JOIN appointments a ON d.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name,allergen,reaction FROM demographics d JOIN allergies al ON d.patient_id = al.patient_id WHERE reaction = 'Severe';
SELECT diagnosis, COUNT(patient_id) AS diagnosis_count FROM medical_history GROUP BY diagnosis;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(a.appointment_id) AS num_appointments FROM demographics d JOIN appointments a ON d.patient_id = a.patient_id GROUP BY d.patient_id, patient_name;
SELECT medication_name, COUNT(patient_id) AS num_patients FROM medications GROUP BY medication_name HAVING COUNT(patient_id) > 5;
SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS num_allergies FROM demographics d JOIN allergies al ON d.patient_id = al.patient_id GROUP BY d.patient_id, patient_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT d.patient_name, m.diagnosis, a.appointment_date, al.allergen FROM demographics d JOIN medical_history m ON d.patient_id = m.patient_id JOIN appointments a ON d.patient_id = a.patient_id JOIN allergies al ON d.patient_id = al.patient_id WHERE a.appointment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND m.diagnosis = 'Influenza' AND al.reaction = 'Severe';

SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, allergy_count FROM (SELECT d.patient_name, m.diagnosis, COUNT(al.patient_id) AS allergy_count FROM demographics d JOIN medical_history m ON d.patient_id = m.patient_id JOIN allergies al ON d.patient_id = al.patient_id GROUP BY d.patient_name, m.diagnosis) AS temp WHERE allergy_count > 0;

SELECT patient_name, latest_appointment_date FROM (SELECT d.patient_name, MAX(appointment_date) AS latest_appointment_date FROM demographics d JOIN appointments a ON d.patient_id = a.patient_id GROUP BY d.patient_name) AS temp;
SELECT patient_name, MAX(date_of_birth) AS oldest_date_of_birth FROM demographics;
SELECT patient_name, AVG(date_of_birth) AS avg_age FROM demographics;

SELECT diagnosis, SUM(CASE WHEN treatment = 'Medication' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS medication_count, SUM(CASE WHEN treatment = 'Surgery' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS surgery_count FROM medical_history GROUP BY diagnosis;
SELECT patient_name, MIN(appointment_date) AS first_appointment FROM demographics d JOIN appointments a ON d.patient_id = a.patient_id GROUP BY d.patient_name;
SELECT patient_name, medication_name FROM demographics d JOIN medications md ON d.patient_id = md.patient_id WHERE medication_name IN ('Aspirin', 'Penicillin', 'Ibuprofen');

SELECT patient_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM (SELECT patient_id FROM demographics UNION ALL SELECT patient_id FROM medical_history UNION ALL SELECT patient_id FROM medications UNION ALL SELECT patient_id FROM appointments UNION ALL SELECT patient_id FROM allergies) AS temp GROUP BY patient_name HAVING COUNT(*) = 5;
SELECT patient_name, AVG(cast(datediff(year, date_of_birth, getdate()) as float)) AS avg_age FROM demographics GROUP BY patient_name;

SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_patients FROM demographics UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_records FROM medical_history UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_medications FROM medications UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(appointment_id) AS total_appointments FROM appointments UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(patient_id) AS total_allergies FROM allergies;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, appointment_date, notes FROM demographics d JOIN appointments a ON d.patient_id = a.patient_id WHERE YEAR(appointment_date) = 2022;
